description: For a home renovation business in Ipswich, we implemented a targeted PPC campaign that resulted in a 14 qualified leads in a month.

For another home renovation business, we developed an SEO strategy that resulted in a first page ranking for key keywords and a 200% increase in organic traffic with 10 quote-ready leads being generated in a month
For a B2B software company, we created a social media marketing campaign that increased followers by 55% and generated a 30% increase in online sales.
